definition: to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: It is possible that these same characteristics are ones that encourage promiscuity.
sentences.chinese: 難道這些特質也成了鼓勵濫交的特質不成？

sentences.english: The threats of prosecution and persecution have usually been enough to keep polygamists subdued. But lately they are becoming emboldened.
sentences.chinese: 濫交和強迫性行爲只是一夫多妻制最顯見的危害所在。

sentences.english: A white-fronted bee-eater, a species with very low rates of promiscuity.
sentences.chinese: 一隻白頂食蜂鳥，這一物種的濫交比率非常低。

definition: to undermine/to let someone down/to seduce someone away from something
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to not take to heart/to be free of worried thoughts/to adopt a lighthearted perspective/lighthearted
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
clean-living and honest (idiom); to avoid immorality/to shun evil influence/to mind one's own business and keep out of trouble/to keep one's hands clean
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
